text: Thailand may be a popular holiday

which has had a fair amount of violent
disruption in recent years in the south
there's been a simmering Muslim

itself political turbulence has led to

and protests which have sometimes

in 2010 it became the focal point of a

there was violence by protesters -

there are many CCTVs and you can see
